name: Plains Training
description: Goblins gather in the distant woods—prepare for their approach.

name: Midtown Skirmish
description: Hold the line along the Town's edge as enemy forces advance.

name: Snakehead Road
description: Enemies stalk the winding path—guard every step.

name: Jungle Skirmish
description: Clashes erupt deep within the undergrowth—stay sharp.

name: Guerilla Forest
description: Ambushes await beneath the canopy—defend with precision.

name: Mountain Pass
description: The enemy strikes swiftly through narrow terrain—hold your ground.

name: Ruined Outpost
description: Defend what's left of a fallen bastion—resources are scarce.

name: Last Stand
description: This is it—the enemy’s full force descends. You must not fall.
